songs.title: La ballade de Lady marmelade
songs.lyrics:
Seasons change but I still stay The fall of time makes me run away And I cry... so I cry The pretty things day after day The lovely words you sing for me My lady... marmalade

The outfit of the perfect man That you don't want that I try So fine... oh my love With you the world adorned me better We annoy all the liars... hmm hmm

All that glitters is not gold But remember they want us "sold" You smile, and your hands make us stronger All your dreams are beautiful Their greeds will not make you fold Come on, come and sing me your song

Seasons change you stay with me Your two front teeth make me happy And I roar... oh I roar The war of nerves now is ended The color of weather is yours my lady... marmalade

I'll be your guide for all the seasons Sing your ballad for many reasons I will sing On all the places, wherever Every day it will be the summer... hmm hmm

My lady Marmalade

All that glitters is not gold But remember they want us "sold" Your smile, and your hands make us stronger All your dreams are beautiful Their greeds will not make you fold Come on, come and sing me your song
